mapper.select: SELECT create_date, count(*) as num, sum(row_count) as row_count, sum(num) as tbl_col_num from (select dt as create_date, row_count, num from ((select dt, table_name, count(*) as num from view_met_quality WHERE dw_id = #{dwId} group by dt, table_name) t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.table_name = t2.tbl_name)) t3 GROUP BY create_date order by create_date limit #{limit};

SELECT ifnull(count(*), 0) as total_tables , ifnull(sum(row_count), 0) as total_rows , ifnull(sum(col_num), 0) as total_columns FROM (select dt, table_name, count(*) as col_num, row_count from view_met_quality t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.table_name = t2.tbl_name WHERE t1.dw_id = #{dwId} group by dt, table_name, row_count) t3;

select ifnull(count(*), 0) as today_tables , ifnull(sum(row_count), 0) as today_rows , ifnull(sum(num), 0) as today_columns from (select num, num * row_count as row_count, num * tbl_col_num as tbl_col_num from (select table_name, count(*) as num from view_met_quality where dt = current_date() and dw_id = #{dwId} group by table_name) t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.table_name = t2.tbl_name) t3
